Posts.Content: Hello.This is my first time on the forum. I was just diagnosed with prostate cancer. My Gleason score is 7 and my Prostavysion score is 2. I dont know how to deal with this. Im scared gor myself and my marraige. My wife has been supportive. I have done a little research. Has there been anyone else who was given a Gleason score of 7? If so, I'd really appreciate your story. Thanks in advance and God bless.
Posts.Title: Worried about my prostate diagnosis
